name: Finger of Death
entries: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@damage 7d8 + 30} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
A humanoid killed by this spell rises at the start of your next turn as a {@creature zombie} that is permanently under your command, following your verbal orders to the best of its ability.
